means: family ： 指构成一个家庭的全体成员，与家里的房子无关。
home ： 侧重人们生长或长期居住或组织家庭的地方或房子，含感情色彩。
house ： 指家里人居住的房屋，不带感情色彩。

word_mean: 家族，家属：共同祖先传下的群体
科：动植物分类学的一个部分，在目(或亚目)之下，在族(或亚科)之上

sentence.Network_en: The family was often in flight, hiding out in friends' houses.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一家人常常东躲西藏，在朋友家里避风头。

sentence.Network_en: Each family farms individually and reaps the benefit of its labor.
sentence.Network_cn: 各家经营各自的农场，收获各自的劳动成果。

sentence.Network_en: Ah yes, but think of all the family life they're missing.
sentence.Network_cn: 是这样，不过别忘了他们错过了多少天伦之乐。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 收藏查看台视家庭台本词条缺少信息栏、名片图，补充相关内容使词条更完整，还能快速升级，赶紧来吧！ 台视家庭台是（台视）旗下频道之一，以与职场以及其所延伸出来的上下两代成员（包括、等）作为主要目标收视族群，制播符合台湾传统主流家庭价值与女性价值的节目内容，主张重视家庭、关系、亲子、价值、等，并标举“女性”（female）、“家庭”（family）、“时尚”（fashion）、“贴心”（friendly）、“快乐”（fun）作为台视家庭台节目的五.
在同一“科”（family）中，一些物种可能比其他属中的物种之间有更多共同的特征。花和果的相似性是用得最多的用来进行比较的特征。.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in sense 2; also denoting the servants of a household or the retinue of a nobleman): from Latin familia 'household servants, household, family', from famulus 'servant'

entry.def: A family is a group of people who are related to each other, especially parents and their children.

example.ex: There's room in there for a family of five...
His family are completely behind him, whatever he decides...
example.tran: 他无论作出什么决定，家人都全力支持。

entry.def: When people talk about a family, they sometimes mean children.

example.ex: They decided to start a family.

entry.def: When people talk about their family, they sometimes mean their ancestors.

example.ex: Her family came to Los Angeles at the turn of the century.
example.tran: 她的祖先在世纪之交时来到洛杉矶。

example.ex: ...homes where their families had lived for generations.

entry.def: You can use family to describe things that belong to a particular family.

example.ex: He returned to the family home...
I was working in the family business.

entry.tran: 全家共用的;全家共享的
entry.def: You can use family to describe things that are designed to be used or enjoyed by both parents and children.

example.ex: It had been designed as a family house...
example.tran: 这房子的设计适合一家老小共同居住。

example.ex: A wedding is a family event.

entry.def: A family of animals or plants is a group of related species.

example.ex: ...foods in the cabbage family, such as Brussels sprouts.
example.tran: 抱子甘蓝之类的十字花科食物

sentences.sentence: "I waited until the whole house was asleep"
"the teacher asked how many people made up his home"

means.word_mean: 2. primary social group; parents and children;

sentences.sentence: "he wanted to have a good job before starting a family"

means.word_mean: 3. people descended from a common ancestor;

sentences.sentence: "his family has lived in Massachusetts since the Mayflower"

means.word_mean: 4. a collection of things sharing a common attribute;
5. an association of people who share common beliefs or activities;

sentences.sentence: "the message was addressed not just to employees but to every member of the company family"
"the church welcomed new members into its fellowship"

means.word_mean: 6. (biology) a taxonomic group containing one or more genera;
7. a person having kinship with another or others;
8. a loose affiliation of gangsters in charge of organized criminal activities

auth_sentence.content: But campaigning on the family name is one thing.
auth_sentence.res_content: But campaigning on the family name is one thing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But campaigning on the family name is one thing.

auth_sentence.content: She and her family were given titles and gifts.
auth_sentence.res_content: She and her family were given titles and gifts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She and her family were given titles and gifts.

auth_sentence.content: He was a family man and a true gentleman.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was a family man and a true gentleman.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was a family man and a true gentleman.

sentences.en: We won't have a family until we've been married a few years.
sentences.cn: 我们打算结婚几年后再要孩子。

sentences.en: The royal family consists of the king and queen and their relatives.
sentences.cn: 王室成员包括国王、王后及其亲属。

jushi.english: The will obliges the heirs to live in the family mansion.
jushi.chinese: 遗嘱要求继承人住在这一家的私宅里。

jushi.english: My family have gone to my aunt's, but I stay at home.
jushi.chinese: 我的家人到我姑母家去了,我留在家里。

jushi.english: We'll let his family know that he is in danger.
jushi.chinese: 我们得马上通知他的家属,告诉他们他的处境很危险。
